title: Koichiro Uno's Wet and Riding, Uno Koichiro no Nurete Noru

sources.title: Koichiro Uno's Wet and Riding, Uno Koichiro no Nurete Noru
sources.description: Just in case you were wondering if the Japanese had raunchy sex comedies, here is Junichi Suzuki's masterpiece Koichiro Uno's Wet and Riding. There seems to be a bit of infatuation with having sex on trains or, in this case, oogling women on trains.Â  Oddly, there were proper subtitles for this one. Japanese with optional English subtitles
